Action.author: ynamiki
Action.body: ~denyeart , ~manish-sethi , I would appreciate if you could give a comment.

Action.author: manish-sethi
Action.body: ~ynamiki yes, the four fields that you mentioned above are reserved for the internal use by couch/fabric. Here is the link to the doc - http://hyperledger-fabric.readthedocs.io/en/release-1.1/couchdb_as_state_database.html . On your query on adding checks for more fields starting reserved for couch usage - yes, seems reasonable to me. ~chris.elder - what do you think?

Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: Merged in master (v1.2), but not yet merged in release-1.1.

Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: Sub-task must also be completed in v1.2 and v1.1.2. Tagging as 'must-fix'.

Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: Sub-task also merged in master (v1.2). I will remove 'must-fix' tag, but leave open for the v1.1.2 CR.

Action.author: denyeart
